To deploy the contract:

1 - Go on Remix (https://remix.ethereum.org/)
2 - Create a file in the contracts directory (give him the name of the token)
3 - Copy and paste the code
4 - Compile
5 - Go on Deploy and run transactions
6 - Connect the Wallet in Environnement
7 - Add parameters and click on Deploy and Verify

Input Example:
    initialSupply: 1
    signers: ["0xd8239b609c74fd6d98e7254ba41f0680c58d9751", "0xe2fa84967ecb35d186864e0347259915121f8693"] (My 2 Wallet adresses)
    _requiredSignatures: 2

8 - You can now add the token on Metamask, or use the contract functions from Remix
9 - Verify the contract on BscScan (https://testnet.bscscan.com):
    - Go on Verify contract
    - Input the adresse of the contract, seect single file, the compier version (see in Soidity compiler) and the License type
    - Now go on Remix, right click on your file, and select Flatten (To avoid openzeppein import error)
    - Then, copy your flattened file as the contract code on BsdScan
    - Finally, add the constructor arguments ABI-encoded (You cans use https://abi.hashex.org )
    - Click on verify and Pubish and its done!
Input example ABI encoded for publishing on BscScan Testnet
